segments.text: Observing this kitchen, I take in the details calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, towel in hand, drying a plate attentively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet runs full, sink full to the brim, water cascading over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms on the floor, reaching her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the two-step stool, body extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand dips into the cookie jar in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool legs splay out, tilting precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands nearby, arm raised in expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above sink shows a neat garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, panes divided into squares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes and bowls stack on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a snapshot of everyday life with hidden tensions.
segments.speaker: PAR
